overview: Fiction Based on Real Facts  The film talks about the life of Jairo Santos, who dedicated his life to learning and producing professional audiovisual and who suddenly found himself without prospects for work, due to the pandemic of COVID 19. Driven by the force of need, he opted for disruption and started to fight against the adversities of modest life. And only with what he had in hand, he took the initiative to start an audiovisual channel on Youtube.
title: 2020 The Disruption
